text: Marin Ferecatu (born 3 May 1940) is a Romanian former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:People from Roșiorii de Vede Category:Romanian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Romania Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics
title: Marin Ferecatu
